attributes.review: The amount of glitching and shutting down it did to my phone is astronomical. It wasted my phone battery and when it would actually run my phone would heat up till it was scorching hot. There were no previous problems with my phone before downloading this app.
attributes.title: Horrendous software

attributes.review: When I downloaded the trump app I was expecting it to be exactly what it sounds like. But instead the app delivered mini trumps!😡They all started to knock down my door then started to destroy my house. Then they walked into my room and proceeded to eat my pet snail and my dogs. My house is now destroyed and my pets are dead, this app took so much from me....😥
attributes.title: It destroyed my life!😡

attributes.review: I downloaded this app for the president to keep up with him, and guess what! This app made my wife leave me! Thats right! And theres more. I got AIDS the next day! And then, oh and then, I lost my job and my house! Don’t even mention how I was robbed and have no money. This app has brought only pain and misery to my life once I downloaded it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!
attributes.title: Worst App Ever!

attributes.review: this app is not very functional. i had trouble navigating my way around and it made me uncomfortable with the amount of personal data it was requesting. 0/10 if there was an option to give it zero stars i would. i do NOT recommend this app for anyone; liberals, chumpy trumpies, or anyone for that matter.
attributes.title: absolutely terrible❤️

attributes.review: this app will track wherever you are at all times! Plus we simple don't like Trump. He’s disgusting and disrespectful to the Lgbtq+, Colored People, and Women. How could you like somebody you does that stuff? Bring back Slavery? He didnt even want to give the Stimulus Check, without the government forcing him. So disgusting and All you trump supports should go to HELL ! Love yall byee ;) <3
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP !

attributes.review: this app is terrible!! it took over 2 months to download, making it completely useless!! while it was downloading it would hack into my phone and random pictures of oranges would pop up on my screen saying “make america great again” which is a complete lie!! america has not and will never be great so this app is giving out false information. it also hacked into my phone, got my ip, and sacrificed my dog to trump! i don’t want my dog coming back from the after life looking like an orange!! whoever made this app is a complete disgrace  to america!!!
attributes.title: do not download😤😤

attributes.review: This app is no good it’s complete non sense , the app made me want to break my phone because the app is beyond slow and it glitches a lot there’s no purpose too it . As you can see everyone in the reviews hates this app because it is pointless and a big WASTE of storage , just remove it from the App Store .
attributes.title: Hurry up n leave .

attributes.review: Being a Hispanic myself, I never supported him but after seeing what’s he’s doing to my people is just sicking. I rather them get sent back to mexico where they can have there needs, instead of just sleeping on the floor with tinfoil for blankets. Not to mention so many children have been assaulted and have gone missing.
attributes.title: VOTE TRUMP OUT

attributes.review: This app is so bad do not download it. When I did my phone exploded and killed my whole family. I was lucky to be alive but my leg is broken. If you download this app something else might happen to you. If I could I would give it 0 stars. Be prepared to download it with your own will so god help you.
attributes.title: I broke my leg cuz of this app

attributes.review: I am terribly disappointed with the service of this app. I tried my best to find ways to support the president but time and time again, he failed me and the entire country; the whole world as a matter a fact. This app doesn’t even work since it is built off lies, racism, deception, and the infamous MAGA jerk circle. THIS APP IS TERRIBLE.
attributes.title: Disappointed
